annotations.description: Template for building a full demo application (frontend + api + bot + bucket) using sxapi in an openshift PaaS

message: Your demo stack started to build in your project. You can use openshift console to observe deployment.

annotations.description: Couchbase operator beta image relying on Kubernetes 1.7 or Openshift 3.7
Couchbase base image relying on CentOS 7 and based on startx/sv-couchbase docker image
NodeJS base image relying on ${BASE_IMAGE_TAG} and based on startx/nodejs docker image
NodeJS API frontend for the SXAPI Demo
NodeJS API frontend for the SXAPI Demo
NodeJS Web frontend for the SXAPI Demo

parameters.name: SOURCE_BRANCH
parameters.description: Name of the branch to use for building this application (dev, master, test, prod)

parameters.name: BASE_IMAGE_TAG
parameters.description: Base image flavour to use for buidling this application (latest, fc27, fc28, centos6, centos7)

parameters.name: DEMO_API
parameters.description: Domain name of the API endpoint to use in this frontend (api-xxxxx.openshift.demo.startx.fr were xxxxx is your project namespace)

parameters.name: WEBHOOK_TOKEN
parameters.description: Secret token to use in github, gitlab or other to hook build action when code change

parameters.name: CB_BASE_IMAGE_TAG
parameters.description: Couchbase image release to use for buidling cluster nodes and job task (5.1.0, 5.5.0-Mar, 5.5.0-beta)

parameters.name: COUCHBASE_PASSWORD
parameters.description: Database password of the application user

parameters.name: COUCHBASE_BUCKET
parameters.description: name of the bucket to create for example

parameters.name: COUCHBASE_BUCKET_TYPE
parameters.description: Bucket type for the couchabse bucket (ephemeral, couchbase or memcache)

parameters.name: twitter_consumer_key
parameters.description: Twitter consumer key to use for receiving twitter stream

parameters.name: twitter_consumer_secret
parameters.description: Twitter consumer secret to use for receiving twitter stream

parameters.name: twitter_access_token_key
parameters.description: Twitter access token key to use for receiving twitter stream

parameters.name: twitter_access_token_secret
parameters.description: Twitter access token secret to use for receiving twitter stream
